alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Toombs, central Telfair, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Jordan, or 7 miles south of Mount Vernon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Uvalda, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Alston, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, McNatt Falls, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
